title: Prey University Looking for Gold+ Mid Laner!! (sponsored team)
body:
Hello I am Arphenion of Prey University and we currently are looking for new talent in our mid lane role.

We currently will be having try outs next wendsday, Thursday, and Friday at 4pm central till 10pm central!

Please fill out the following information as best you can or contact me in game at PGU Arphenion or contact one of the other starters at Bytme, RagingSpermWhale, or Comrade Comback.

Application

How old are u?

Rank in season 4?

Time Zone?

Top 5 champions in the mid lane?

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls?

How long have u been playing league? 

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team?

After u fill out this application note that tryouts will be held and each person will get about two games a piece and the results will be told on this thread on Friday December 12th.

replies.body:
rank : gold 5
position: mid , 
top 5: mid(kat,ryze,xerath ,ziggs, liss)

streghts : good team figther , keeps vision on map and try to work around team comp

weakness: laning pase isnt my best but it aint bad ether if im having a bad laning phase i just usually sit back and wait for team figths to start so i can get started

time zone central

ign : outherhaven

im 22 yrs old been playing sinse beta and im currently out of the competitive trying to get back into it

How old are u? 18

Rank in season 4? Gold 5

Time Zone? PST

Top 5 champions in the mid lane? zed, syndra, leblanc, xerath, orianna

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls? very well, played on many teams on league and many other games

How long have u been playing league? since season 2

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? i bring a fun and positive personality and also a very experienced shot caller

How old are u? 21

Rank in season 4? G2

Time Zone? Central

Top 5 champions in the mid lane? Ahri/Leblanc/Fizz/Zed/Syndra

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls? Yes/Yes

How long have u been playing league? Season 1

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? Map awareness

How old are u? 20

Rank in season 4? Diamond

Time Zone? PST

Top 5 champions in the mid lane? {{champion:103}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:25}} 

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls? 

How long have u been playing league? Since Season 1

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team?

How old are u? 

18

Rank in season 4?

Gold IV

Time Zone?

Central

Top 5 champions in the mid lane?

Talon - Vel'koz - Cho'gath - Akali - Anivia (I play about 12 mid Champions on a regular basis to work with team comps but these are my 5 most successful in recent games)

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls?

team is everything, without team play and communication games are lost.  Always willing to listen to calls, but also to add to them if needed.

How long have u been playing league?

since late season 1 

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team?

Flexibility, high league IQ.  I have 95 champions and can easily trade or fill other roles etc. always adapting to the current game state, whether its the meta, or the game im currently in.  As for high league IQ, I rarely make bad decisions on my own, I know when I can win a fight, when to sit back, when I can safely push, cs, dive, when I NEED to roam, when I need to get out. Oh and I'm also very aware of everything my lane opponent brings to the game, cooldowns, skills, and rough damage.

How old are u? 16

Rank in season 4? Plat 2, but I'm D4 right now.

Time Zone? EST

Top 5 champions in the mid lane? Nidalee, Zed, Leblanc, Kha Zix, Nidalee

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls? I'm pretty calm in most situations. I usually communicate with my jglers to set up ganks or objectives.

How long have u been playing league? Closed Beta, but I had to sell the account due to problems in real life.

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? shot calling, funny personality, carrying? lol

How Old Are U? 14

Rank in season 4? D5

Time Zone? EST

Top 8 champions in the mid lane? Katarina, Leblanc, Lux, Rumble(look at my ranked stats this season, ALL BUT 3 GAMES ARE RUMBLE MID), Syndra, Twisted Fate, Yasuo, Jayce.

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls? I work pretty well with teams. But I suck.

How long have u been playing? Since late season 1. League of Atmogs, FoN and HoG.

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? I get people hyped mannn, Swag yolo 420 blazing it all night long. #Getfucked other applicants cuz I'm 2 hype for u. I've been on several different ranked teams and have gained a lot of experience from doing so. I enjoy playing with a group and find ranked as a time where balancing having fun and being serious is important. All in all though, I'm a pretty chill guy and would love to join your team. My name is King Smack a Hoe III, I was trained by Chris Brown and Kanye. Ma niqqa Chris taught me how to beat a hoe, Kanye ma man told me the art of getting away with it.

#rap god #swag #thegod #getrekt #nerfirelia #chill #stop #reading #these #hashtags #you #scrub #lol

How old are u? 22

Rank in season 4? D5

Time Zone? PST

Top 5 champions in the mid lane? Ori, Ziggs Xerath Ahri Zed

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls? 10/10

How long have u been playing league? season 2

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? I bring the desire to win, I have been looking for competitive team setting for a while now and cant find a team who last more then a week, I bring high game knowledge, some one who adapts to the meta, ( some one who wards lol) and some one who has leadership and shot calling experience.

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? i'm cute. (✿◠‿◠)

Rank in season 4? Gold (I believe my skill is higher though)

Time Zone? Mountain Standard

Top 5 champions in the mid lane? Zed, Yasuo, Syndra, Jayce, and Twisted Fate

How well do u work in a team setting and are willing to listen to calls? I work the BEST in a team setting and i'm 100% willing to listen to calls maybe even help make some if needed.

How long have u been playing league? Since season 2

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? I'm a more upbeat kind of person so I can help morale boost if the team is feeling down after a loss and I either win my lane or break even. I never really lose too bad, and am willing to roam a ton to help out other lanes.

Please add me if you think I have a shot, I'd really like this.

How long have u been playing league? For 2 years

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? I learn quickly hence I made it from Bronze 3 to Gold 5 this season. I also have good mechanics.

What unique skill / trait do you bring to a team? I am really good at winning lane, and carrying my team, as well as I am a good team player, have good leadership, and know lots about the game itself.
